snippet.title: Pixel Ripped 1978 - Official Launch Trailer | Upload VR Showcase 2023
snippet.description: Check out the trailer for Pixel Ripped 1978, the latest in the VR series where you get to dive into video game classics from yesteryear. This time we're headed back to the 1970s to explore a collection of genuine Atari classics in virtual reality. Available on Meta Quest 2, Steam VR, and PSVR 2.
